title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Description: When using the library outline view, any item cannot be selected initially. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view. This behavior prevents the first selection from being made correctly.
OB: Any item can't be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the library outline view. 
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view for the first time. 
3. Observe that the focus immediately jumps to the library file node, preventing the first selection.
